name: Voidlings Sphere
description: This was made for the Void development jam. I got pretty busy so it's not as polished as I like, and the code's pretty sloppy too. You can still check out the source code if you'd like at https://github.com/thepaperpilot/incremental-game-template/tree/voidlings. You can also play at tpp.rocks/voidlings.
